entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
